index.title: Choose the next song
index.description: {appName} is the app that lets you choose what plays at your favorite venues. Now, you're the DJ.

venues.title1: A new way to connect with your customers
venues.description1: {appName} helps you build customer loyalty through music. Let them choose what plays at your venue.
venues.description2: {appName} adapts to all types of venues. All you need is a Spotify Premium account and a device to play music.
venues.description2_2: These venues are already using it.
venues.description3: Let your customers view the venue's playback queue and add their own songs. You control the playback.
venues.description4: {appName} is free for customers. Businesses can choose from various plans depending on their venue type. Choose what suits you best.
venues.feature1: Share your venue’s access code with your customers
venues.feature2: Let customers add songs to the queue
venues.feature3: Manage the queue and venue settings
venues.actionTitle: Ready to take your business to the next level?
venues.actionDescription: Contact us to get {appName} for your venue.

pricing.spotifyPremiumRequired: A Spotify Premium account is required

bigBusiness.title: Chains and Large Businesses
bigBusiness.description: Ideal for chains or venues over 150 m².
bigBusiness.benefit1: All benefits of the small business plan

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or want more info about {appName}? Send us a message and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll contact you soon.
contact.errorMessage: An error occurred while sending your message. Please try again later.

clientLogin.title: Client Access
clientLogin.description: Enter the venue access code to continue

venueLogin.title: Venue Access
venueLogin.description: Enter your account details to log in

venuePlayingQueue.title: Playback Queue
venuePlayingQueue.empty: There are no songs in the playback queue. Ask the venue staff to start playing music on Spotify.
venuePlayingQueue.songAdded: Song added to the playback queue
venuePlayingQueue.songRemoved: Song removed from the playback queue
venuePlayingQueue.addSongsCTA: Go to {appURL} and enter this code to add songs:

error.noQueue: Could not retrieve the playback queue. Ask the venue staff to configure it.
error.limitReached: You’ve reached the limit of songs you can add to the queue.

tutorial.title: Follow these steps to set up the playback queue:
tutorial.step1: Log into Spotify with a Premium account in the Settings tab.
tutorial.step2: Open the Spotify app with the chosen account and start playing music.
tutorial.step3: Refresh the queue using the button at the top to view the songs.

spotifyLogin.title: Log into Spotify
spotifyLogin.description: To display the playback queue, you need to log into Spotify.

limitTracks.title: Limit Number of Songs
limitTracks.description: Limit how many songs a customer can add to the playback queue.

accessCode.title: View Access Code
accessCode.description: See the access code customers will use to join your venue.

modifyVenue.title: Edit Venue Details
modifyVenue.description: Change the venue name, description, image, and social media links.

limitTracks.title: Limit Number of Songs
limitTracks.description: Limit how many songs a customer can add in total to the playback queue. Leave the field blank to remove the limit.

accessCode.title: View Access Code
accessCode.description: This is the access code customers use to enter your venue. Share it with them.
